insect.coverage.instrumentation
Class ProbeInserter

java.lang.Object
  insect.coverage.instrumentation.ProbeInserter
public class ProbeInserter
extends java.lang.Object

Responsible for performing the actual instrumentation of a set of classes. Coordinates the probe inserters by initializing files, retrieving bytecode information, etc and then instructing each probe inserter to instrument on a per method basis.

Author:
Anil Chawla

Method Detail

instrument

public boolean instrument(java.lang.String outFileDir)
Instruments the classes by coordinating all of the probe inserters.

Parameters:
outFileDir - filepath to place id files
Returns:
true if successful, otherwise false

getClassID

public java.lang.Integer getClassID(java.lang.String name)
Returns the insect class-level id of the specified class or method

Parameters:
name - class name or method signature
Returns:
Integer containing the id

isInstrumented

public boolean isInstrumented(java.lang.String name)
Returns whether or not the class or method with the specified name is (in the process of being) instrumented.

Parameters:
name - class name or method signature
Returns:
true or false

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
For testing purposes. Instruments the specified classes and places them in the current directory.
